name: San Andreas Crime City Gangster 3D
description:
San Andreas Crime City Gangster 3D - One of the best action games based on crimes and criminals life.

Criminals destroyed whole city by shooting and killing innocent citizen of San Andres. An unexpected dangerous chaos arouse in the city; criminals Shot innocent, robbed and killed the helpless people of San Andres. A beautiful city of peace & culture soon rehabilitated into crime city. You're a real street fighter, just escaped from outlaw. Now it's time to become an angry young citizen and plot a revenge against all the killers.

Freely move around the city - shooting and killing all the enemies around you. Keep your guns loaded - Aim and Shoot!

Thanks for playing San Andreas Crime City Gangster 3D
